summary: I have a Construction Project Manager and Engineer with over 20 years of experience, including recent projects in commercial and multi residential. Expert at problem-resolution and planning and managing projects from inception through completion. I am experienced in supervising all levels of technicians, engineers, and craft and in building relationships with international teams of managers and staff. I have an excellent oral and written communication skills. Also eleven years of comprehensive accounting, management experience, cross-trained in numerous accounting functions, dealt with private companies. Areas of expertise comprise the following: Excellent Communication Skill; Efficient Management and Leadership ability; Effective budgeting and cost management of projects; Expertise with latest tools and techniques; Efficient planning and coordination of activities; Effective quality checking of final deliveries; Excellent Time Management to finish the work scheduled on Time

experience.title: Project Engineer & Project Manager
experience.description: Established record of competence in professional roles requiring proficiencies in engineering and monitoring. As a Civil Engineer/Construction Engineer (DCHFA - District of Columbia Housing Finance Agency, Washington DC), managed a 4500-unit affordable housing program delivering engineering services for complex projects (multifamily, commercial and single-family houses); directed preliminary studies/surveys, design/layout, and costing; contributed to project presentations before Procurement, Contract Coordination, and Construction through completion and start-up. Produced on-the-spot engineering as required. Designed and reviewed green building projects (LEED-certified or Green Building Act). Revised CAD drawings for as-built status and AIA Contracts (A-201, A-211, A-111, A-101). Assisted with proposals and responses to RFPs/RFQs for public and private sector projects. Prepared preconstruction and construction scheduling. Awarded bids, ordered equipment and materials, expediting and tracking shipments. Checked quality of final product and deliverables at each phase. Prepared articles for activities, cost, and other things. Completed projects with customer satisfaction. Reviewed blueprints and design before development. Managed a team of workers and engineers. Prepared equipment and instrumentation folders for one-source maintenance reference. Prepared punch-list with scope, drawings, bill of material, and preliminary pricing. Prepared weekly, bi-weekly and monthly construction meetings. Prepared and revised monthly Requisition and Change Orders (AIA Documents G702, G703).

experience.title: Construction Sr. Project Manager
experience.description: Reviewed contract and regulatory documents to ensure compliance with standards. Managed a 25-member team across multiple construction projects. Efficiently oversaw more than four projects at a time and coordinated construction activities. Conducted budget and cost analyses, scheduled tasks, and maintained quality within budget. Ensured quality of final product at each phase. Prepared articles for activities and costs. Managed projects with customer satisfaction. Reviewed blueprints and designs before development. Handled a $20 million project within the scheduled timeframe. Managed teams of workers and engineers. Prepared punch-lists with scope, drawings, bill of materials, and preliminary pricing. Prepared weekly, bi-weekly and monthly construction meetings. Revised monthly Requisitions and Change Orders (AIA Documents G702, G703, G701, G704).

experience.title: Project Engineer
experience.description: Managed a 160-member unit in delivery of engineering services for complex projects (hydroelectric facilities, wastewater/sewage plants, subterranean tunneling, highways, etc.); directed preliminary studies/surveys, design/layout, and costing; contributed to project presentations before government/World Bank officials.

experience.title: Army Construction Officer
experience.description: Managed and coordinated Turkish army and NATO projects for inspection and compliance with military construction codes for complex projects.

certifications: Civil Engineer License; Affiliated with the Chamber of Civil Engineering (Turkey)
MS Office training (MS Project, Excel, Word, Power Point, Access)
